summary: The client outlined the project requirements for BrightHR Lite--DELME2, including problem statement, target users, features, success criteria, constraints, and existing assets. The PM summarized the details for confirmation and proposed moving to requirements refinement or sprint planning upon approval.

actions.task: Review and confirm the project vision summary provided by PM Sarah, providing any tweaks or additions

backlog_deltas.title: Define MVP features: Employee directory, Leave/absence management, Document storage
Plan for nice-to-have features: Onboarding checklist, Performance review tracking, Email notifications

risks.risk: Budget constraint of <$5K for pilot may limit hosting and development scope
risks.mitigation: Use lightweight Vercel and Supabase deployment to stay within budget

risks.risk: GDPR compliance requirements could add development time
risks.mitigation: Implement basic data export and deletion features early in development
